get.description: Returns a collection of theatre employees

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of employees per one page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Language of data you want to receive

404.description: Returned when the entities with given limit and offset are not found

get.description: Returns an Employee by unique property {slug}

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of employee in database

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Language of data you want to receive

404.description: Returned when employee by {slug} not found in database

get.description: Returns an Employee roles by unique property {slug}

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of employee in database

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Language of data you want to receive

404.description: Returned when employee by {slug} not found in database

get.description: Multiple status values can be provided with comma seperated strings

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count entries at one page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of page to be shown

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive

200.description: Returned when all parameters were correct

404.description: Returned when the entities with given limit and offset are not found

get.summary: Find an Post by unique property {slug}

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Slug of Post to use

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive

200.description: Returned when Post by {slug} was found

404.description: Returned when Post by {slug} was not found

get.summary: Returns Posts for Tag by his unique {slug}

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Tag slug

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive, default is "uk"

200.description: Returned when Tag by slug was found in database

404.description: Returned when Tag by slug was not found in database

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count entries at one page, default is 10

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of page to be shown, default is 1

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive, default is "uk"

200.description: Returned when all parameters were correct

404.description: Returned when the entities with given limit and offset are not found

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Performance slug

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive, default is "uk"

404.description: Returned when Performance by slug was not found in database

get.summary: Find a collection of theatre performanceEvents
get.description: Returns a collection of theatre performanceEvents

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Find entries from this date, fromat=dd-mm-yyyy

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Find entries to this date, fromat=dd-mm-yyyy

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count of entities in collection

parameters.name: performance
parameters.description: Performance slug

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive

200.description: Returned when all parameters were correct

400.description: Returned when date diff more than 1 year

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: PerformanceEvent ID

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive

404.description: Returned when performanceevent was not found by ID

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Count entries at one page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of page to be shown

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: Selects language of data you want to receive

404.description: Returned when the entities with given limit and offset are not found
